Module PetriNet
Package petrinet

Class Transition

java.lang.Object
petrinet.Transition
public class Transition extends Object
The 'Transition' class represents a state in a Petri net where a firing event can occur. It manages the arcs associated with the transition and provides methods to control its behavior.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Transition()
    Constructs a new Transition with no initial arcs.
    Transition(List<Arc> arcs)
    Constructs a new Transition with a specified list of arcs.

    Method
    Description

    Deletes a specified arc from the list of arcs connected to this transition.
    void
    fire()
    Fires the transition, updating connected places according to Petri net semantics.
    boolean
    fireable()
    Checks if the transition is fireable based on the current state of connected places.

    • fireable

      public boolean fireable()
      Checks if the transition is fireable based on the current state of connected places.
      Returns:
      True if the transition is fireable, otherwise false.
